{"step_by_step_thinking": "The relevant documents reviewed the literature on simvastatin's efficacy in treating hypercholesterolemia. They reported significant reductions in circulating cholesterol levels, LDL-lipoprotein levels, and total cholesterol levels in various patient groups. The studies also evaluated HDL-cholesterol levels, triglycerides, and other biochemical parameters, but did not report any findings related to depressive symptoms. Therefore, there is no direct evidence supporting or refuting the alleviation of depressive symptoms by simvastatin.", "answer_choice": "B"}
